title: Bug 120315: Display property set to 'none' not working in new PDF emitter
description: When the display property of an item is set to 'none', it is not taking effect in the new PDF emitter.
OB: Currently, when previewing the PDF, the label is still visible even though its display property is set to 'none'.
EB: When previewing the PDF, the label should not be visible because its display property is set to 'none'.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a label.
2. Open the 'properties' view.
3. Set the 'sectionDisplay' property to 'none'.
4. Preview the PDF.
